timeline.bodyText: Is SSL really required for everybody? I think we agreed with @lburgazzoli that we should mention this in the extension doc page and let the users decide whether they need it or not. It is similar with encodings and time zones.
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: I mean users should enable those things via their application.properties
replies.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: In this case, there's stuff in HttpClientBuilder that wants to configure an SSLContext by default. Not sure if I should be looking to suppress that stuff (probably not).
replies.author: jamesnetherton

timeline.bodyText: I appreciate the well written the doc text!
